official_title: To amend the Family and Medical Leave Act of 1993 to permit leave after the death of a spouse for widows and widowers with minor children.

summary.text: Amends the Family and Medical Leave Act of 1993 to entitle an eligible employee to take leave because of the death of a spouse, in order to care for a child.
